div.p: I am remarried, I’ve got 3 children 27, 25 and 21 they’re all grown up of course, I’ve got 3 grandchildren; I’m married again now
I’m on my second marriage, my wife now works, or did work, for the police service she’s very supportive, very supportive of
the horrendous shifts working sort of 18 or 19 hours a day and you’re going to come home and stuff and then you’re expected back
and what have you but my wife, Debbie, now has been very, very supportive of my role in that whilst I was in the job, yeah, very.
I play golf, I’m mad for it; I go to the gym, I love doing triathlons because I used to play a lot of football but I do triathlons now
and it’s a different sort of form of keeping fit and stuff. My wife and I love eating out and going to the cinema and stuff like that
just generally relaxing really; we’ve got 2 dogs I’m out with them every day and they’re real good company and we do that and go on holiday...
